.entry-header
PRIVATE EVENTS
UNIQUE SPACE IS AVAILABLE FOR YOUR NEXT SPECIAL OCCASION
Several rental packages are available, with options including a complete selection of Barrel of Monks beers, served fresh and cold. Event packages can include dedicated service, and catering is welcomed.
Upstairs
Our upstairs room is available for rental for your next meeting, gathering, or party. This room is capable of holding 60 for a standing cocktail party or up to 40 for a seated event. The room can be decorated by you (*some restrictions apply) to make it festive and fun!
The room can also be configured as a meeting room that can fit 24, including a conference table.
The room contains a 65 inch flat screen TV for presentations, or for sports, videos, or television. There is also a sound system for your use available.
This is a flexible room capable of hosting many kinds of events ‚Äì use your imagination and make it special for your next celebration or occasion! Please note that the room is not handicap accessible. Decorations are not provided by Barrel of Monks. Some furniture is available.
Flexible packages may include drinks (beer, wine, and sodas). Catering can be provided by Cheffrey Eats (see below) or you can provide your own catering or food.
Availability and options can be discussed with Emilio by emailing emilio@barrelofmonks.com
Typical pricing:
$500 entire night
$250 for a couple of hours *prices do not include bar tab, taxes, or gratuity
$150 for meetings that do not require service
* Examples of previous decorated events, decorations are to be provided by the host.
Catering
Cheffrey Eats is on-site daily as our resident food truck. It is owned and operated by classically trained chef Jeff Lemmerman. In addition to serving a la carte, he also offers a catering menu, hors d‚Äôoeuvres, and beer & dinner pairing events.
Catering Menu (pdf)
FOOD TRUCK MENU
Guests are also welcome to bring in their own snacks or have their party catered independently.
* Examples of previous decorated events, decorations are to be provided by the host.

Barrel of Monks Brewery
in Boca Raton
Barrel Of Monks Brewery in Boca Raton has been proudly serving beer enthusiasts for the past 8 years.
Our Story
We are a group of close friends who shared a passion for Belgian-style beer and a shared dream: to establish a brewery that would bring the authentic flavors of Belgium to the United States. With a laser focus on quality, we set out to do something rarely seen in the country: create a brewery dedicated to crafting exceptional Belgian-style brews that would captivate the senses. Our philosophy is simple yet profound: we blend traditional techniques with modern technology to deliver beers of unparalleled excellence.
Our journey began several years ago when we embarked on a series of trips to Belgium, the birthplace of our favorite
beers
. These journeys were more than mere visits; they were transformative experiences that enriched us on both personal and professional levels. As we immersed ourselves in the vibrant Belgian brewing culture, we delved into the heart and soul of the beers we loved. Every step of the way, we learned not only about the brewing process but also about ourselves: our passion, our dedication and our unwavering commitment to crafting extraordinary beer.
MEET THE TEAM
Conveniently Located in Boca Raton, Florida
Located in the heart of South Florida, Barrel Of Monks Brewing in Boca Raton has been proudly serving beer enthusiasts for the past 8 years. Our dedication to crafting exceptional brews has led to our brewery being visited by thousands of locals and visitors every year, solidifying our reputation as a premier brewery and beer pub in the region. Our goals are simple: create the most flavorful beers possible while providing exceptional service to our customers. We strive to provide an inviting atmosphere for everyone who visits us.
CLICK HERE
for directions to Barrel of Monks Brewery in Boca Raton, Fl.
WHERE TO FIND OUR BEER
If you can‚Äôt visit Barrel Of Monks Brewing in person, enjoy our beer in hundreds of stores and restaurants all over South Florida and throughout Florida.
However, the best place to find the largest selection of our beers will always be in the tasting room at our brewery. There you will find a large assortment of to-go beers including multiple styles and many limited release and special products. There is something there for every taste!
Classic and
Contemporary Beers
At our brewery, we offer a unique experience that combines the rich history of Belgian brewing with the excitement of modern beer styles. Drawing inspiration from the traditional artistry of Belgian beers, often produced by monks in monasteries, we create beers with complex flavors that captivate the senses. We use only the finest imported malts and hops, ensuring that every sip of our beer is a testament to our commitment to quality.

Family and Dog Friendly
In addition to our exceptional beer selection, we pride ourselves on creating a welcoming and enjoyable atmosphere for our guests. We are proud to be a family-friendly establishment, welcoming both kids and dogs to join in the fun. Our tap room provides both indoor and outdoor seating options, allowing you to relax and savor our beers in a setting that suits your preference.

Our tap room provides both indoor and outdoor seating options, allowing you to relax and savor our beers in a setting that suits your preference.
AND
MORE
Events
As part of our commitment to providing an unforgettable experience, we host a variety of events each week. From live music performances that enhance the ambiance to exciting new release events that keep our offerings fresh and enticing, there's always something happening at Barrel Of Monks Brewery.
VIEW FULL CALENDAR
Food Truck
And as a testament to our dedication to variety, we have our permanent resident food truck on-site every day, ensuring that you can indulge in delicious eats while enjoying our exceptional brews. The award winning Cheffrey Eats food truck is open during our operating hours, come enjoy delicious food and drink at our beer pub!
SEE MENU
Specials
Don‚Äôt miss out on our weekly specials, including BOGO Tuesday, Wings Wednesday and Tacos Thursday.
LEARN MORE
Free Parking
We also offer ample free parking, so you can easily join us without worrying about the hassle of finding a spot.

Our Team
Barrel Of Monks Brewery in Boca Raton has been proudly serving beer enthusiasts for the past 8 years.
ABOUT US
Barrel of Monks was founded by good friends who came together to create something that has seldom been done in the United States‚Ä¶ a brewery specializing in Belgian-style beer. The focus is on quality ‚Äì combining traditional techniques with modern technology.
THE JOURNEY
‚Äã
Several years ago, they started traveling to Belgium to see how their favorite
beers
were brewed. Along the way, they learned about themselves as well as the beer. They started brewing themselves and never looked back, honing their brewing skills to develop high quality ales reminiscent of the fine ales coming out of Belgium.
THE MONKS
Kevin Abbott
Kevin is the Director of Operations, responsible for all aspects of operations of the brewery, including sales, production, and staffing.
Keith DeLoach
Keith is an entrepreneur with a wealth of knowledge and experience in many arenas. He maintains our forward momentum.
Bill McFee
Bill is a trained brewmaster, who is responsible for recipe design, and supervises processes in the brewery.
Matthew Saady
Matthew is a scientist by heart and dedication. Matt oversees lab activities that include yeast management, quality control and yeast strain development.
